tasks.label: Dev: Kill port 3001 (Windows)
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$p = (Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3001 -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique); if ($p) { Stop-Process -Id $p -Force; Write-Output ('killed ' + $p) } else { Write-Output 'no listener on 3001' }"
